trans-unit.source: Describes what was changed in your Visual Studio project after you ran the Azure Active Directory wizard
trans-unit.target: Describes what was changed in your Visual Studio project after you ran the Azure Active Directory wizard

trans-unit.source: What happened to my project?
trans-unit.target: What happened to my project?

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.SELECTOR]
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: Getting Started
trans-unit.target: Getting Started

trans-unit.source: What Happened
trans-unit.target: What Happened

trans-unit.source: References have been added
trans-unit.target: References have been added

trans-unit.source: NuGet package references
trans-unit.target: NuGet package references

trans-unit.source: .NET references
trans-unit.target: .NET references

trans-unit.source: Code changes
trans-unit.target: Code changes

trans-unit.source: Code files were added to your project
trans-unit.target: Code files were added to your project

trans-unit.source: An authentication startup class, **App_Start/Startup.Auth.cs** was added to your project containing startup logic for Azure AD authentication.
trans-unit.target: An authentication startup class, **App_Start/Startup.Auth.cs** was added to your project containing startup logic for Azure AD authentication.

trans-unit.source: Startup code was added to your project
trans-unit.target: Startup code was added to your project

trans-unit.source: If you already had a Startup class in your project, the **Configuration** method was updated to include a call to `ConfigureAuth(app)`.
trans-unit.target: If you already had a Startup class in your project, the **Configuration** method was updated to include a call to `ConfigureAuth(app)`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a Startup class was added to your project.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, a Startup class was added to your project.

trans-unit.source: Your app.config or web.config file has new configuration values.
trans-unit.target: Your app.config or web.config file has new configuration values.

trans-unit.source: The following configuration entries have been added.
trans-unit.target: The following configuration entries have been added.

trans-unit.source: An Azure AD App was created
trans-unit.target: An Azure AD App was created

trans-unit.source: An Azure AD Application was created in the directory that you selected in the wizard.
trans-unit.target: An Azure AD Application was created in the directory that you selected in the wizard.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: If I checked *disable Individual User Accounts authentication*, what additional changes were made to my project?
trans-unit.target: If I checked *disable Individual User Accounts authentication*, what additional changes were made to my project?

trans-unit.source: NuGet package references were removed, and files were removed and backed up.
trans-unit.target: NuGet package references were removed, and files were removed and backed up.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the state of your project, you may have to manually remove additional references or files, or modify code as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Depending on the state of your project, you may have to manually remove additional references or files, or modify code as appropriate.

trans-unit.source: NuGet package references removed (for those present)
trans-unit.target: NuGet package references removed (for those present)

trans-unit.source: Code files backed up and removed (for those present)
trans-unit.target: Code files backed up and removed (for those present)

trans-unit.source: Each of following files was backed up and removed from the project.
trans-unit.target: Each of following files was backed up and removed from the project.

trans-unit.source: Backup files are located in a 'Backup' folder at the root of the project's directory.
trans-unit.target: Backup files are located in a 'Backup' folder at the root of the project's directory.

trans-unit.source: Code files backed up (for those present)
trans-unit.target: Code files backed up (for those present)

trans-unit.source: Each of following files was backed up before being replaced.
trans-unit.target: Each of following files was backed up before being replaced.

trans-unit.source: Backup files are located in a 'Backup' folder at the root of the project's directory.
trans-unit.target: Backup files are located in a 'Backup' folder at the root of the project's directory.

trans-unit.source: If I checked *Read directory data*, what additional changes were made to my project?
trans-unit.target: If I checked *Read directory data*, what additional changes were made to my project?

trans-unit.source: Additional changes were made to your app.config or web.config
trans-unit.target: Additional changes were made to your app.config or web.config

trans-unit.source: The following additional configuration entries have been added.
trans-unit.target: The following additional configuration entries have been added.

trans-unit.source: Your Azure Active Directory App was updated
trans-unit.target: Your Azure Active Directory App was updated

trans-unit.source: Your Azure Active Directory App was updated to include the *Read directory data* permission and an additional key was created which was then used as the *ida:Password* in the `web.config` file.
trans-unit.target: Your Azure Active Directory App was updated to include the *Read directory data* permission and an additional key was created which was then used as the *ida:Password* in the `web.config` file.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
